title: Journey AI Scores
description: Journey AI scores provided by the Journey AI intelligent service. The service provides engagement scores for email channel and send-time-optimization scores for both email channel and push notification channel.

xdm:engagementScores.title: Journey AI Engagement Scores
xdm:engagementScores.description: Journey AI Engagement Scores provide likelihoods of a customer engaging with a newly delivered message.

xdm:sendTimeOptimization.title: Journey AI Send Time Optimization
xdm:sendTimeOptimization.description: Journey AI Send Time Optimization scores provide the time preferences for message deliveries. Higher score means a better outcome (for example email got clicked) is expected, if a message sent at the corresponding hour.
